Verses: 1 appozhudhu Karththar: Perunkaatrilirundhu Yobukku Uththaravaaga:
2 arivillaadha Vaarththaigalinaal Aalosanaiyai Andhagaarappaduththugira Ivan Yaar?
3 ippodhum Purushanaippol Idaikattikkol; Naan Unnaik Ketpen; Nee Enakku Uththaravu Sollu.
4 naan Boomiyai Asthibaarappaduththugirapodhu Nee Engeyirundhaai? Nee Arivaaliyaanaal Adhai Arivi.
5 adharku Alavu Kuriththavar Yaar? Adhinmel Noolpottavar Yaar? Idhai Nee Arindhirundhaal Sollu.
6 adhin Aadhaarangal Edhinmel Podappattadhu? Adhin Kodikkallai Vaiththavar Yaar?
7 appozhudhu Vidiyarkaalaththu Natchaththirangal Egamaaip Paadi, Dhevapuththirar Ellaarum Gembeeriththaargale.
8 karppaththilirundhu Udhikkiradhupol Samuththiram Puranduvandhapodhu, Adhaik Kadhavugalaal Adaiththavar Yaar?
9 megaththai Adharku Vasthiramaagavum, Irulai Adharkup Pudavaiyaagavum Naan Uduththinapodhum,
10 naan Adharku Ellaiyaik Kuriththu, Adharkuth Thaazhppaalgalaiyum Kadhavugalaiyum Pottu:
11 immattum Vaa, Minji Varaadhe; Un Alaigalin Perumai Inge Adangakkadavadhu Endru Naan Sollugirapodhum Nee Engeyirundhaai?
12 dhushtargal Boomiyilirundhu Udharippodappadumpadikku, Adhin Kadaiyaandharangalaip Pidikkumporuttu,
13 un Jeevakaalaththil Eppodhaavadhu Nee Vidiyarkaalaththukkuk Kattalaikoduththu, Arunodhayaththukku Adhin Idaththaik Kaanbiththadhundo?
14 boomi Muththiraiyidappatta Kalimanpol Vere Roobankollum; Sagalamum Vasthiram Thariththirukkiradhupol Kaanappadum.
15 dhunmaarkkarin Oli Avargalaivittu Edupadum; Mettimaiyaana Buyam Murikkappadum.
16 nee Samuththiraththin Adiththalangalmattum Pugundhu, Aazhaththin Adiyil Ulaavinadhundo?
17 maranavaasalgal Unakkuth Thirandhadhundo? Marana Irulin Vaasalgalai Nee Paarththadhundo?
18 nee Boomiyin Visaalangalai Aaraaindhu Arindhadhundo? Ivaigalaiyellaam Nee Arindhirundhaal Sollu.
19 velichcham Vaasamaayirukkum Idaththukku Vazhiyenge? Irul Kudikondirukkum Sthaanamenge?
20 adhin Ellai Innadhendru Unakkuth Theriyumo? Adhin Veettukkuppogira Paadhaiyai Arindhirukkiraayo?
21 nee Adhai Ariyumpadi Appodhu Pirandhirundhaayo? Un Naatkalin Thogai Avvalavu Peridho?
22 uraindha Mazhaiyin Pandasaalaigalukkul Nee Pravesiththaayo? Kalmazhaiyirukkira Pandasaalaigalaip Paarththaayo?
23 aabaththu Varunkaalaththilum, Kalagamum Yuththamum Varunkaalaththilum, Prayogikkumpadi Naan Avaigalai Vaiththuvaiththirukkiren.
24 velichcham Paravappadugiradharkum, Keezhkaatru Boomiyinmel Veesugiradharkumaana Vazhi Enge?
25 paazhum Andharaveliyumaana Tharaiyaith Thirupthiyaakki, Ilampoondugalin Mulaigalai Mulaikkappannumpadi,
26 boomiyengum Manushar Kudiyillaadha Idaththilum, Manushasanjaaramillaadha Vanaandharaththilum Mazhaiyai Varushikkappanni,
27 vellaththukku Neerkkaalgalaiyum, Idimuzhakkangalodu Varum Minnalukku Vazhigalaiyum Paguththavar Yaar?
28 mazhaikku Oru Thagappanundo? Paniththuligalai Janippiththavar Yaar?
29 uraindha Thanneer Yaarudaiya Vayitrilirundhu Purappadugiradhu? Aagaayaththinudaiya Uraindha Paniyaip Petravar Yaar?
30 jalam Kalluruvankondu Maraindhu, Aazhaththin Mugam Kettiyaai Uraindhirukkiradhe.
31 arumeen Natchaththiraththin Sugirdha Sambandhaththai Nee Inaikkakkoodumo? Alladhu Mirugaseerishaththin Kattugalai Avizhppaayo?
32 raasigalai Adhinadhin Kaalaththile Varappannuvaayo? Dhuruvachchakkara Natchaththiraththaiyum Adhai Serndha Natchaththirangalaiyum Vazhinadaththuvaayo?
33 vaanaththin Niyamangalai Nee Arivaayo? Adhu Boomiyaiyaalum Aalugaiyai Nee Thittampannuvaayo?
34 eraalamaana Thanneer Unmel Soriyavenum Endru Un Saththaththai Megangalpariyandham Uyarththuvaayo?
35 nee Minnalgalai Azhaiththanuppi, Avaigal Purappattuvandhu: Idho, Ingeyirukkirom Endru Unakku Sollumpadi Seyvaayo?
36 andhakkaranangalil Gnaanaththai Vaiththavar Yaar? Ullaththil Buththiyaik Koduththavar Yaar?
37 gnaanaththinaale Kodimaasigalai Ennubavar Yaar?
38 thoolaanadhu Egapaalamaagavum, Mankattigal Ondrodondru Ottikkollavum, Aagaayaththuruththigalilulla Thanneeraip Pozhiyappannugiravar Yaar?
39 nee Singaththukku Iraiyai Vettaiyaadi,
40 singakkuttigal Thaangal Thangum Idangalile Kidandhu Kebiyile Padhivirukkirapodhu, Avaigalin Aasaiyaith Thirupthiyaakkuvaayo?
41 kaakkaikkunjugal Dhevanai Nokkik Kooppittu, Aagaaramillaamal Parandhu Alaigirapodhu, Avaigalukku Iraiyai Savadhariththuk Kodukkiravar Yaar?
